text: tavada “(api kæmati akarayata) kumak ho saksiyak (deviyange nabivaraya vana) ohu kerehi ohuge deviyan visin pahala kala yutu noveda?” yayida ovun pavasannaha. eyata (nabiye!) oba mese pavasanu: “(oba kæmati prakara saksiya pahala nokara sitimata hetuva obata gupta dæyaki). gupta dæya siyalla allahtama ayatya. (ebævin eya oba dæna gænimata adahas kalahot) oba balaporottuven sitinu. niyata vasayenma mamat (obage napuru vadanin obata kumana vinnæhiyak pæminenneda yanna) oba samaga balaporottuven sitinnemi”
